summary.p: Converts a given value to a 32-bit unsigned integer.

examples.p: The following shows TO_UINT32 results for some input data:
examples.sampleCode: SELECT 'The TO_UINT32 result of value ''1'' is: ' AS Input, TO_UINT32('1') AS Value UNION ALL SELECT 'The TO_UINT32 result of value 120000.999 is: ' AS Input, TO_UINT32(120000.999) AS Value UNION ALL SELECT 'The TO_UINT32 result of value 120001.999 is: ' AS Input, TO_UINT32(120001.999) AS Value
